message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start the conversation. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $14,000?
